values.name: CREATE_INSTANT_INVITE
values.description: Allows creation of instant invites

values.name: KICK_MEMBERS  *
values.description: Allows kicking members

values.name: BAN_MEMBERS  *
values.description: Allows banning members

values.name: ADMINISTRATOR  *
values.description: Allows all permissions and bypasses channel permission overwrites

values.name: MANAGE_CHANNELS  *
values.description: Allows management and editing of channels

values.name: MANAGE_GUILD  *
values.description: Allows management and editing of the guild

values.name: ADD_REACTIONS
values.description: Allows for the addition of reactions to messages

values.name: VIEW_AUDIT_LOG
values.description: Allows for viewing of audit logs

values.name: PRIORITY_SPEAKER
values.description: Allows for using priority speaker in a voice channel

values.name: STREAM
values.description: Allows the user to go live

values.name: VIEW_CHANNEL
values.description: Allows guild members to view a channel, which includes reading messages in text channels

values.name: SEND_MESSAGES
values.description: Allows for sending messages in a channel (does not allow sending messages in threads)

values.name: SEND_TTS_MESSAGES
values.description: Allows for sending of `/tts` messages

values.name: MANAGE_MESSAGES  *
values.description: Allows for deletion of other users messages

values.name: EMBED_LINKS
values.description: Links sent by users with this permission will be auto-embedded

values.name: ATTACH_FILES
values.description: Allows for uploading images and files

values.name: READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY
values.description: Allows for reading of message history

values.name: MENTION_EVERYONE
values.description: Allows for using the `@everyone` tag to notify all users in a channel, and the `@here` tag to notify all online users in a channel

values.name: USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS
values.description: Allows the usage of custom emojis from other servers

values.name: VIEW_GUILD_INSIGHTS
values.description: Allows for viewing guild insights

values.name: CONNECT
values.description: Allows for joining of a voice channel

values.name: SPEAK
values.description: Allows for speaking in a voice channel

values.name: MUTE_MEMBERS
values.description: Allows for muting members in a voice channel

values.name: DEAFEN_MEMBERS
values.description: Allows for deafening of members in a voice channel

values.name: MOVE_MEMBERS
values.description: Allows for moving of members between voice channels

values.name: USE_VAD
values.description: Allows for using voice-activity-detection in a voice channel

values.name: CHANGE_NICKNAME
values.description: Allows for modification of own nickname

values.name: MANAGE_NICKNAMES
values.description: Allows for modification of other users nicknames

values.name: MANAGE_ROLES  *
values.description: Allows management and editing of roles

values.name: MANAGE_WEBHOOKS  *
values.description: Allows management and editing of webhooks

values.name: MANAGE_EMOJIS_AND_STICKERS  *
values.description: Allows management and editing of emojis and stickers

values.name: USE_APPLICATION_COMMANDS
values.description: Allows members to use application commands, including slash commands and context menu commands.

values.name: REQUEST_TO_SPEAK
values.description: Allows for requesting to speak in stage channels. (_This permission is under active development and may be changed or removed._)

values.name: MANAGE_EVENTS
values.description: Allows for creating, editing, and deleting scheduled events

values.name: MANAGE_THREADS  *
values.description: Allows for deleting and archiving threads, and viewing all private threads

values.name: CREATE_PUBLIC_THREADS
values.description: Allows for creating public and announcement threads

values.name: CREATE_PRIVATE_THREADS
values.description: Allows for creating private threads

values.name: USE_EXTERNAL_STICKERS
values.description: Allows the usage of custom stickers from other servers

values.name: SEND_MESSAGES_IN_THREADS
values.description: Allows for sending messages in threads

values.name: START_EMBEDDED_ACTIVITIES
values.description: Allows for launching activities (applications with the `EMBEDDED` flag) in a voice channel

values.name: MODERATE_MEMBERS  * *
values.description: Allows for timing out users to prevent them from sending or reacting to messages in chat and threads, and from speaking in voice and stage channels
